summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jojos Boutick e-commerce store. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend navigation, homepage, categories, shop page, and track order functionality working correctly. Identified and fixed critical cart API bug (MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue).

resolved_bugs.issue: Cart API endpoints returning 520 errors due to MongoDB ObjectId not being JSON serializable
resolved_bugs.fix_applied: Updated get_or_create_cart function to refetch cart data after insertion to ensure clean data without ObjectId

ui_bugs.issue: Product page elements (price, add to cart button, quantity controls) not found with current data-testid selectors
ui_bugs.status: Needs investigation - products display but detailed product page interactions may not be working

integration_issues.flow: Add to cart from product page
integration_issues.issue: Unable to locate and test add to cart functionality on product pages
integration_issues.impact: Cannot verify full e-commerce flow from product view to cart

passed_tests: All 10 backend API endpoints working correctly (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, categories, and featured products
Navigation between pages (Home, Shop, Track Order) working
Categories section displaying 5 product categories correctly
Shop page displays products with filtering functionality
Track Order page with functional input and results display
Cart page displays properly (shows empty state when no items)
Category filtering on shop page working
Product navigation from shop to product pages working
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate product page implementation - ensure data-testid attributes are properly added to product page elements (price display, add to cart button, quantity controls, size/color selectors) as these could not be found during testing. The product pages load correctly but interactive elements are not accessible for testing.
